title: Most popular social media sites in Norway 2019 , by platform
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of respondents and Tumblr has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Platform is 81.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of respondents and Tumblr has the lowest Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Platform is 81.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Tumblr.
Platform Snapchat has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The highest Platform Facebook has 81.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Platform Tumblr.
Share of respondents at Platform Facebook is 83.0 , second place is Snapchat at 61.0, and thirdly is YouTube at 60.0.
Platform Pinterest, and Whatsapp share the same value 16.0.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 10 Platforms is roughly 34.2.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 342.0.
